price: Kemudian Dia menyempurnakannya dan meniupkan roh (ciptaan)-Nya ke dalam (tubuh)nya dan Dia menjadikan pendengaran, penglihatan dan hati bagimu, (tetapi) sedikit sekali dari kamu yang bersyukur.
arabic: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma sawwāhu wanafakha fīhi min rūḥihi wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
